Title: Best non-toxic detergent ever for the dishwasher!
Body: This is the best detergent we’ve ever used! We purchased it after using several “natural” brands. I was discouraged with paying a lot of money for a non-toxic detergent, not getting clean dishes, and having the formerly shiny stainless steel flatware come out of the dishwasher tarnished. I even ended up buying a bottle of a super toxic, mass produced brand to alternate between a popular natural detergent. The dishes came out cleaner, but they were dull and hazy and the glasses were always spotted. I couldn’t stand the lingering toxic smell on them. I had to rinse every dish, glass, pot, plate, and piece of silverware silverware to get the residue off before using them.The first thing I noticed about this product is how good it smells. I am sensitive to synthetic fragrances and can only tolerate pure essential oils. Citrus oils are my favorite, and after opening the bottle I couldn’t stop smelling it. My husband was laughing at me and finally grabbed it and said it smelled great, and I had to fight to get it back!We followed the directions and used just a teaspoon in the machine. I’ll admit we were skeptical that such a small amount would work, but we have never seen such clean dishes.The plates were completely spotless and shiny without any dried food stuck to them, and the  glasses came out shiny and clear without looking hazy or spotted - not even one spot! I don’t know how it happened, but we put our dingy, spotted jelly jar drinking glasses in and they came out looking like we just bought them!The glass jars we use to store food in the refrigerator also came out perfectly clean. I was worried about those because they’re always greasy and they go on the top shelf. Not only did the product clean them, but now they look brand new!The stainless steel pots and pans came out shiny and bright, and even the silverware (that had been badly tarnished by a popular “natural” dishwashing detergent) began to look better. I’m sure that it will be restored to its natural look with a few washings.After using upwards of ten different brands over a span of several years and being consistently dissatisfied, we have finally found the perfect non-toxic dish detergent and will never use another brand!

It makes me wonder if the oils are dissolving the product container - that appears to be plastic - and perhaps plastic should be part of the ingredient list . What is the effect of this product on plastic parts within the dishwasher?  The plasticware and silicone were suppose to be dishwasher safe. Perhaps no plastic or silicone should be washed in dishwasher.As to the effectiveness of cleaning, I was not impressed.  It could be because I only used 1/2 tsp. product as suggested by some reviewers also other reviewers mentioned the smell. I am glad I only used that amount.  Imagine that the smell would have been even more pronounced. The container recommends 1 tsp. For good cleaning results, I would also recommend that amount.  I won't know, probably will not use again.

Title: High temperature gloves that work!
Body: I do some high temperature cooking.  After seeing the slow melt of my previous set of oven mitts, I purchased the Ove Glove.  It did not work.  At temperatures of about 500 degrees of higher, the heat passed through the glove to my hand as if it was not there at all.So I bought these.  And now that I've tried them at 550 degrees, I can verify that they work at least to that temperature.  I can't test them at their maximum temperature of 660 degrees because my ovens maximum temperature is 550.  But I am very pleased that I can now cook at that temperature without melting my oven mitts or burning my hand.My only complaint is about the gloves' size.  I have medium sized hands for a woman and these gloves seem made for a large man's hands.  That won't stop me from using them.  But they look enormous on me and they feel decidedly oversized.

Title: Fabulous and Reasonably Priced
